title: エロ×ハラ
summary:
エロ×ハラ raw,エロ×ハラ zip,エロ×ハラ manga								Ero × hara Raw

Iizuka Kenji, who lives a smooth sailing life, now wants a sexy and cute girlfriend of his choice and a "kind boss". Takasugi Ruri, a section chief who is famously strict, is unusually harsh only towards Kenji, and Kenji gets fed up with her every day. He wonders if there is a way to shut Ruri up somehow... and he comes up with a false confession! He wanted to confess in front of everyone and make Kenji feel awkward just being around her, but as soon as he confessed, Ruri suddenly became different and more spoiled than usual――!?
